title: Broadband diffusion of terahertz waves by multi-bit coding metasurfaces
title_cn: 太赫兹波通过多比特编码超表面的宽带扩散
abstract: The terahertz region is a special region of the electromagnetic spectrum that incorporates the advantages of both microwaves and infrared light waves. In the past decade, metamaterials with effective medium parameters or gradient phases have been studied to control terahertz waves and realize functional devices. Here, we present a new approach to manipulate terahertz waves by using coding metasurfaces that are composed of digital coding elements. We propose a general coding unit based on a Minkowski closed-loop particle that is capable of generating 1-bit coding (with two phase states of 0 and 180°), 2-bit coding (with four phase states of 0, 90°, 180°, and 270°), and multi-bit coding elements in the terahertz frequencies by using different geometric scales. We show that multi-bit coding metasurfaces have strong abilities to control terahertz waves by designing-specific coding sequences. As an application, we demonstrate a new scattering strategy of terahertz waves—broadband and wide-angle diffusion—using a 2-bit coding metasurface with a special coding design and verify it by both numerical simulations and experiments. The presented method opens a new route to reducing the scattering of terahertz waves.
abstract_cn: 太赫兹区是电磁频谱的一个特殊区域，结合了微波和红外光波的优点。在过去的十年中，已经研究了具有有效介质参数或梯度相位的超材料，以控制太赫兹波并实现功能器件。在这里，我们提出一种通过使用由数字编码元素组成的编码超表面来处理太赫兹波的新方法。我们提出了一种基于Minkowski闭环粒子的通用编码单元，该编码单元能够生成1位编码（两个相位状态分别为0和180＆＃176;），2位编码（带有4个相位状态分别为0、90和90 ＃176;，180＆＃176;和270.＃176;），以及通过使用不同的几何比例在太赫兹频率中的多位编码元素。我们表明，通过设计特定的编码序列，多位编码超表面具有强大的能力来控制太赫兹波。作为一种应用，我们演示了使用2位编码超表面和特殊编码设计的太赫兹波，宽带和广角扩散的新散射策略，并通过数值模拟和实验进行了验证。该方法为减少太赫兹波的散射开辟了一条新途径。

title: Ultra-subwavelength phase-sensitive Fano-imaging of localized photonic modes
title_cn: 局部光子模式的超亚波长相位敏感型Fano成像
abstract: Photonic and plasmonic devices rely on nanoscale control of the local density of optical states (LDOS) in dielectric and metallic environments. The tremendous progress in designing and tailoring the electric LDOS of nano-resonators requires an investigation tool that is able to access the detailed features of the optical localized resonant modes with deep-subwavelength spatial resolution. This scenario has motivated the development of different nanoscale imaging techniques. Here, we prove that a technique involving the combination of scanning near-field optical microscopy with resonant scattering spectroscopy enables imaging the electric LDOS in nano-resonators with outstanding spatial resolution (λ/19) by means of a pure optical method based on light scattering. Using this technique, we investigate the properties of photonic crystal nanocavities, demonstrating that the resonant modes appear as characteristic Fano line shapes, which arise from interference. Therefore, by monitoring the spatial variation of the Fano line shape, we locally measure the phase modulation of the resonant modes without the need of external heterodyne detection. This novel, deep-subwavelength imaging method allows us to access both the intensity and the phase modulation of localized electric fields. Finally, this technique could be implemented on any type of platform, being particularly appealing for those based on non-optically active material, such as silicon, glass, polymers, or metals.
abstract_cn: 光子和等离激元设备依赖于介电和金属环境中对光学状态（LDOS）局部密度的纳米级控制。在设计和定制纳米谐振器电LDOS方面的巨大进步需要一种调查工具，该工具必须能够以深亚波长空间分辨率访问光学局部谐振模的详细功能。这种情况激发了不同纳米级成像技术的发展。在这里，我们证明了一种结合扫描近场光学显微镜和共振散射光谱技术的技术，使得基于纯光学方法的纳米级共振器中的电LDOS能够以出色的空间分辨率（＆＃955; / 19）成像。在光散射上。使用这种技术，我们研究了光子晶体纳米腔的特性，证明了共振模态表现为特征性的Fano线形，这是由干涉引起的。因此，通过监视Fano线形的空间变化，我们无需外部外差检测就可以局部测量谐振模的相位调制。这种新颖的深亚波长成像方法使我们能够访问局部电场的强度和相位调制。最终，该技术可以在任何类型的平台上实施，对于那些基于非光学活性材料（例如硅，玻璃，聚合物或金属）的技术特别有吸引力。

title: Chiral surface waves supported by biaxial hyperbolic metamaterials
title_cn: 双轴双曲超材料支撑的手性表面波
abstract: We discover a new kind of surface wave on biaxial hyperbolic metamaterial, which, in the k-space, connects the two diabolical points (or conical singularities) of the equifrequency surface. Interestingly, the propagation of such surface wave is found to be sensitive to the refractive index of the surrounding dielectric medium, showing a convex, concave or flat phase front when the refractive index is varied. Furthermore, the surface wave shows an elliptically polarized state, in which helicity is dependent on the propagation direction. This feature can be utilized for the spin-controllable excitation of surface waves, opening a gateway towards integrated photonic circuits with reconfigurable functionalities.
abstract_cn: 我们在双轴双曲线超材料上发现了一种新型的表面波，该表面波在k空间中连接等频率表面的两个分解点（或圆锥奇点）。 有趣的是，发现这种表面波的传播对周围介电介质的折射率敏感，当折射率变化时，其呈现出凸，凹或平坦的相前。 此外，表面波显示椭圆偏振状态，其中螺旋度取决于传播方向。 此功能可用于表面波的自旋可控激发，为通向具有可重构功能的集成光子电路打开了大门。

title: Plasmonic polarization generator in well-routed beaming
title_cn: 等离子束束束中的等离子极化发生器
abstract: As one of the recent advances of optics and photonics, plasmonics has enabled unprecedented optical designs. Having a vectorial configuration of surface plasmon field, metallic nanostructures offer efficient solutions in polarization control with a very limited sample thickness. Many compact polarization devices have been realized using such metallic nanostructures. However, in most of these devices, the functions were usually simple and limited to a few polarization states. Here, we demonstrated a plasmonic polarization generator that can reconfigure an input polarization to all types of polarization states simultaneously. The plasmonic polarization generator is based on the interference of the in-plane (longitudinal) field of the surface plasmons that gives rise to versatile near-field polarization states on a metal surface, which have seldom been considered in previous studies. With a well-designed nanohole array, the in-plane field of SPPs with proper polarization states and phases can be selectively scattered out to the desired light beams. A manifestation of eight focusing beams with well-routed polarizations was experimentally demonstrated. Our design offers a new route to achieve the full control of optical polarizations and possibly advance the development in photonic information processing.
abstract_cn: 作为光学和光子学的最新进展之一，等离激元已经实现了前所未有的光学设计。具有表面等离子体激元场的矢量配置，金属纳米结构以非常有限的样品厚度为偏振控制提供了有效的解决方案。使用这种金属纳米结构已经实现了许多紧凑的偏振装置。但是，在大多数这些设备中，功能通常很简单，并且仅限于少数极化状态。在这里，我们展示了一种等离子体极化发生器，可以同时将输入极化重新配置为所有类型的极化状态。等离子体极化发生器基于表面等离子体激元的面内（纵向）场的干扰，该干扰在金属表面上引起了通用的近场极化状态，这在先前的研究中很少考虑。利用设计良好的纳米孔阵列，可以将具有适当偏振态和相位的SPP的面内场选择性地散射到所需的光束中。实验证明了八束聚焦光束具有良好布线的表现。我们的设计提供了一条新的途径来实现对光偏振的完全控制，并有可能推动光子信息处理的发展。

title: Advantages of white LED lamps and new detector technology in photometry
title_cn: 白光LED灯的优势和光度法中的新检测器技术
abstract: Light emitting diode (LED) lighting is becoming more and more popular, as incandescent lamps are being phased out globally. LEDs have several advantages over incandescent lamps, including energy efficiency, robustness, long lifetime, and good temporal stability. The three latter features make LEDs attractive candidates as new photometric standards. Because the spectra of white LEDs are limited to the visible wavelength range, a novel method for the realization of photometric units based on the predictable quantum efficient detector (PQED) can be utilized. The method eliminates the need of photometric filters that are traditionally used in photometry, and instead relies on carrying out the photometric weighting numerically based on the measured relative spectrum of the source. The PQED-based realization simplifies the traceability chain of photometric measurements significantly as compared with the traditional filter-based method. The measured illuminance values of a white LED deviate by only 0.03% when determined by the new and the traditional methods. The new PQED method has significantly lower expanded uncertainty of 0.26% (k = 2) as compared with that of the traditional filter-based method of 0.42% (k = 2). Furthermore, when filtered photometers that measure LED lighting are calibrated using LED lamps as calibration sources instead of incandescent lamps, a significant decrease in the uncertainty related to the spectral mismatch correction can be obtained. The maximum spectral mismatch errors of LED measurements decreased on average by a factor of 3 when switching from an incandescent lamp to an LED calibration source.
abstract_cn: 随着白炽灯在全球范围内逐步淘汰，发光二极管（LED）照明越来越受欢迎。与白炽灯相比，LED具有许多优势，包括能效，坚固性，长寿命和良好的时间稳定性。后三个功能使LED成为新的光度学标准的有吸引力的候选对象。由于白光LED的光谱仅限于可见光波长范围，因此可以利用一种基于可预测量子效率检测器（PQED）的用于实现光度单位的新颖方法。该方法消除了传统上用于测光的光度过滤器的需要，取而代之的是依赖于基于源的测得的相对光谱在数值上进行光度加权。与传统的基于过滤器的方法相比，基于PQED的实现大大简化了光度测量的可追溯性链。用新方法和传统方法确定时，白光LED的测得照度值仅偏离0.03％。与传统的基于过滤器的方法0.42％（k = 2）相比，新的PQED方法具有0.26％（k = 2）的扩展不确定度低得多。此外，当使用LED灯代替白炽灯作为校准源来校准测量LED照明的滤光光度计时，可以大大降低与光谱失配校正相关的不确定性。从白炽灯切换到LED校准源时，LED测量的最大光谱失配误差平均降低了3倍。

title: Visible light optical coherence tomography measures retinal oxygen metabolic response to systemic oxygenation
title_cn: 可见光光学相干断层扫描测量视网膜氧代谢对全身性充氧的反应
abstract: The lack of capability to quantify oxygen metabolism noninvasively impedes both fundamental investigation and clinical diagnosis of a wide spectrum of diseases including all the major blinding diseases such as age-related macular degeneration, diabetic retinopathy, and glaucoma. Using visible light optical coherence tomography (vis-OCT), we demonstrated accurate and robust measurement of retinal oxygen metabolic rate (rMRO2) noninvasively in rat eyes. We continuously monitored the regulatory response of oxygen consumption to a progressive hypoxic challenge. We found that both oxygen delivery, and rMRO2 increased from the highly regulated retinal circulation (RC) under hypoxia, by 0.28 ± 0.08 µL min−1 (p < 0.001), and 0.20 ± 0.04 µL min−1 (p < 0.001) per 100 mmHg systemic pO2 reduction, respectively. The increased oxygen extraction compensated for the deficient oxygen supply from the poorly regulated choroidal circulation. Results from an oxygen diffusion model based on previous oxygen electrode measurements corroborated our in vivo observations. We believe that vis-OCT has the potential to reveal the fundamental role of oxygen metabolism in various retinal diseases.
